name: DAB 12
description: DAB 12 is the sequel to the eleven-game series 1trickPwnyta created in her teenage years, and is the first of the series to be published online. In this 2D platforming action-adventure game, you control Dab, the hero of the universe, as he traverses the various enemy-filled biomes of the planet Midhia, including the forest, the volcano, and the jungle island, to defeat the business suit-wielding Capitilizts. Collect powerups to increase your health and attack power, and use your trusty spear to vanquish The Capitilizts, skeletons, sentient mushrooms, massive rock golems, and more!
